response: Please type your doubt below, and we’ll notify the project mentor or relevant expert.

response: Yes, you have earned a certificate for this project. You can view and download it from your dashboard.

name: HowToEarnBadges
response: Badges are awarded based on milestones like completing courses and scoring well in quizzes.

name: ShowMyBadges
response: You can see your earned badges in badges section under the achivement option.

response: No there is no any feature of check performance

name: TakeQuiz

response: You need to first complete all the related video modules then you are allowed to give quiz

name: ViewMyProgress
training_phrases: How far am I in the course?
response: Check your progress directly on the learning section.

name: WhatIsPositLearn
training_phrases: Can you explain what PositLearn is?
response: PositLearn is an internal LMS (Learning Management System) platform designed for interns and employees to upskill through structured learning paths, courses, quizzes, discussions, and certification.

name: IsPositLearnFree
training_phrases: Do I need to pay to access PositLearn?
Are the courses on PositLearn paid?
response: Yes, PositLearn is completely free for all assigned interns and employees. All learning materials, quizzes, and certificates are included at no cost.

name: ContactSupport
training_phrases: I need help with the platform
Who do I reach out to for issues?
response: You can reach our support team by clicking the 'Help' icon on your dashboard or emailing support@positlearn.com.

name: HowToStartCourse
training_phrases: How do I start a course?
Where do I begin a course?
response: To start a course, navigate to your 'Projects' and click on any listed course. The first module will guide you from there.

name: IsPositLearnMobileFriendly
training_phrases: Can I access PositLearn on my mobile?
response: Yes, PositLearn is mobile responsive. You can use it via your mobile browser. A dedicated mobile app is under development.

name: ResetPassword
training_phrases: How do I reset my password?
response: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. You'll receive an email with steps to reset your password securely.

name: HowLongToCompleteCourse
training_phrases: How long does it take to complete a course?
Time needed to finish a course
response: Course duration varies, but most are designed to be completed within 1–2 weeks. You can check the estimated time on each course page.

name: DoesProgressSync
training_phrases: Will my progress be saved automatically?
Do I need to save my progress?
response: Yes, your progress is saved automatically in real time. You can continue from where you left off anytime.

name: MultipleCoursesAtOnce
training_phrases: Can I take multiple courses at the same time?
Enroll in more than one course
response: Yes, you can enroll in and work on multiple courses simultaneously. Your progress is tracked separately for each.
